name: Cake Stand with Dome Lid,6 in 1 Cookie Platter & Snack Bowls,Large Serving Plate Platter with lid - Wedding Birthday Parties, Dessert Displays & Family Gatherings
short_description: 6 in 1 Cake Stand: This 6-in-1 cake stand has multiple functions and uses. It can be used as a cake plate with lid, cookie plate, salad bowl, dessert plate or snack plate. Sizes: Cake dome size: 10.4 (D) x 4.3 (H) inch ; base plate size: 11.02(D) x 0.7 (H) inch; bottom support (small bowl) size: 4.5 (L) x 2.3 (H) inch. Please check dimensions before purchasing. Keep Fresh and Clean: Cake stand with dome prevents dust and dirt from getting into the food, avoids insects and ants, and keeps the food fresh and tasty. Easy to Move: Cake stands with lids are too heavy to lift, while cake stand is easy to carry and clean, perfect for families with children and the elderly. Dishwasher safe. Suitable for All Occasions: Cake stands are great for birthday parties, weddings,Christmas and other holiday gatherings, and can also be used as vegetable salad plates, pizza plates, barbecue chicken wing plates.

name: Homeries Acrylic Cake Stand with Lid, Cake Plate, (6 in 1) Multi-Functional Serving Platter, Large Cake Stand with Dome, Cake display stand with lid & Cake Dome - Use as Cake Holder, Cake Cover
short_description: MULTIFUNCTIONAL – This six in one multipurpose cake stand with lid is a unique cake stand with many functions and uses. Use it as a cake plate, cake tray, serving dish, punch and salad bowl, chips and salsa plate, and baking goods stand. Simply invert the dome or plate to create any type of serving dish. SUPER DURABLE – Unlike glass cake stands with lids that are too heavy to lift, this crystal-clear acrylic cake stand with lid is made with lightweight durable acrylic (not glass). it is shatter resistance, it’s easy to carry and clean. It looks like real glass, this means you can showcase your baked goods beautifully without sacrificing durability. PERFECT GIFT – This all in one server is great for parties or family dinners. With its many functions, you can serve everything from appetizers to desserts. It also makes a great housewarming gift, engagement gift or birthday gift for foodies! Although you may want to keep this elegant cake holder and party server for use in your own home. TABLE DÉCOR – When asked to bring a salad, punch or desert to a party, you want your creations to stand out and get noticed. This unique cake display stand with lid/ pedestal cake stand with dome makes an eye-catching centerpiece for buffet-style dinners or holiday parties. EASY TO CLEAN - this cake plate with lid is not only easy to clean but also incredibly practical and economical. It’s dishwasher safe, can withstand hot water, and is made from durable acrylic that ensures it will last for years to come. With its reusable design, cost-effective, saving both time and money while offering lasting quality.

name: Royalty Art Cake Stand with Dome, 6-in-1 Multifunctional Glass Serving Platter for Cakes, Desserts, Fruits, Snacks, Pastries, Appetizers - Elegant Pedestal Display, Durable Italian-Made Glass - Made in Italy
short_description: 6-in-1 Multifunctional Serving Platter: Italian-made glass cake stand that also serves as a fruit tray, vegetable platter, punch bowl, snack tray, cupcake holder, and more; perfect for versatile hosting needs. Elegant Pedestal Cake Stand with Dome: Beautifully crafted in Italy, featuring a stylish glass dome cover and pedestal base; the versatile design enhances any event, party, or gathering with European flair. Portable and Easy to Use: The sturdy base and ergonomic handled dome make this Italian-made cake stand easy to transport and display in kitchens, dining rooms, or at outdoor occasions like barbecues, picnics, and weddings. Durable Italian Glass Construction: Made from high-quality, dishwasher-safe glass, this serving platter offers long-lasting durability and stability, perfect for frequent use in any home or professional setting. Perfect for All Special Occasions: Ideal for showcasing cakes, desserts, fruits, snacks, pastries, and appetizers at birthdays, holidays, weddings, and anniversaries; adds elegance to every culinary presentation. Space-Saving Storage Design: The 6-in-1 Italian design allows the components to nest together for easy and convenient storage, saving valuable space in your kitchen cabinets or pantry. Enhance Your Table Setting: The crystal-clear Italian glass elegantly displays food, creating a stunning centerpiece for any table—perfect for both casual and formal dining occasions. Trusted Quality by Royalty Art: Backed by Royalty Art’s commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, ensuring that this Italian-made multifunctional serving platter meets your expectations for every event.

name: Wedding Cake Stand for Smaller Than 10 Inch Cakes, Christmas Porcelain Cake Plate, White Cake Stand for Party, Baby Shower, Birthday, Home Decorating Stand
short_description: CLASSIC WHITE CAKE DISPLAY STAND - This 10 inch cake stand is specially designed to securely hold cakes smaller than 10 inches. There are floral engravings around the surface, ensuring the perfect proportion to be used as a cake display, cupcake stand, dessert stand, or serve candies, cookies, and fruits. ELEGANT & PRACTICAL DESIGN - The top and base edges of this round dessert stand are designed with a unique floral embossed pattern, simple and elegant. The surface of the cake platter is flat and smooth, designed for easy slicing and serving cakes. The widening and weighted base design makes the cake more stable on the table, even while holding a double-layer wedding cake. PERFECT FOR DECORATING AND ENTERTAINMENT - With an eye-catching and elegant shape, this vintage cake pedestal stand is a stylish way to display a variety of baked goods, perfect for parties, baby showers, holiday gatherings, weddings, birthdays, Christmas, and other special occasions. When you're not hosting a party, it can be used as an everyday centerpiece with candles and seasonal decor. PRO-GRADE PORCELAIN - Our Gomakren cake display stand is made of high-quality and enduring porcelain, lead-free, non-toxic, and chip-resistant. It is safe for everyone to use and no worries about elements getting added to your baked goods or desserts. EASY TO CLEAN - This White cake stand can be used without assembly. The smooth glaze also makes it easy to clean in warm water and wipe with a soft cloth. (Hand wash is recommended.) After a long time of use, this gloss still looks new.
